# Changelog

All notable changes to `laravel-dashboard-velo-tile` will be documented in this file

## 2.1.0 - 2022-02-09

- add Laravel 9 support

## 2.0.1 - 2020-12-12

- allow PHP 8

## 2.0.0 - 2020-09-09

- add support for dashboard v2

## 1.0.1 - 2020-05-22

- fix undefined variable in tile view

## 1.0.0 - 2020-04-30

- initial release
